amendment.description: An amendment numbered 105 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to add the President, Vice President, and any Cabinet member to the current statutory prohibition on Members of Congress contracting with the federal government.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds the President, Vice President, and any Cabinet member to the current statutory prohibition on Members of Congress contracting with the federal government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A026) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 183 (Roll no. 287).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A026) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Bowman.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A026) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 183 (Roll no. 287).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A026) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 183 (Roll no. 287).
